channel.title: Kick with Reason
channel.description:
This is a 508 server | --------------------
I am looking into making ::kick be with a reason, meaning...
When a person types ::kick it will look for the substring(playername) then look for substring(reason) My friend told me I would have to make it into an index and make it search the index for spaces and after each space it will be (playername) (reason)
So, Would I just put all of the command into an index and make the server search the index for spaces and just figure out what the reason is.
Or is there a different way?

item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
